title: Polish poppy seed roll
ingredients: ['500g poppy seeds', '500ml full fat milk', '250g mixed nuts and raisins', '250g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '10 eggs, separated', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '100g fresh yeast, crumbled', '1kg plain flour', '5 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '350ml full fat milk']
